name: Beetle infestation
description: The game was made for GMTK Game Jam 2022, with the theme "Roll of the Dice". Our team interpreted that theme by two ways: the first is the weapon of palyer be choosed by one dice. And the second is the map be randonly generated (we used that ideia in the way of randomness of dices).  In the Game, the player can walk, jump and attack. He is in a egyptian pyramid infested by beetles that he have to defeat. How much more the player defeat beetles, more score he receives, and him objective it's reach the more bigger score possible. Controls: WASD: Movement Space: Jump E: Attack Credits: Artist: Luciano Ramos Game designer: Igor Borges Programmer: Igor da Mata Sound designer: Luciano Ramos
